```{r, message=FALSE}
library(readr)
house_data = read_csv("HousePrices/train.csv")
house_model = lm(log(SalePrice) ~ log(LotArea), data = house_data)
plot(log(SalePrice) ~ log(LotArea), data = house_data, col = "grey", pch = 20,
     main = "Price by LotArea")
abline(house_model, col = "darkorange", lwd = 3)
summary(house_model)
```
